data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BP9HeKP0STsQ7kNvgEqnqH8&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AFdpM2PYjAelRJkILKkKECH&oh=00_AYDa7QzE-GfvkDQ_KMix7fVfNA-2wGGleSHzRzbc2nUDVg&oe=66E42037)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=BB3H9XA5g-sQ7kNvgHdKN4G&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AFdpM2PYjAelRJkILKkKECH&oh=00_AYCNN6wCHZi9BrNmWRcxodzEJTvdgePIwXTMd-UB25ldmQ&oe=66E42DD2)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=IxAQukRO6VcQ7kNvgH6s77e&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=AFdpM2PYjAelRJkILKkKECH&oh=00_AYBKfoRYk8pE0fo9NGsowV6B8LGrTaB0dl3nKUPVeYfRaQ&oe=66E41909)
